---
title: "The bioinformatics compendium"
---

## Motivation

This is a bioinformatics compendium for the publication: [Woodworth et al. A novel adjuvant formulation induces robust Th1/Th17 memory and mucosal recall responses in Non-Human Primates](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/).

The authors aim to enhance scientific rigor, reproducibility, and transparency. By providing this compendium, we intend to

(1) document a fully reproducible pipeline

(2) facilitate the  readers to freely access the data, statistical models, and bioinformatics analyses.

## Data availability

- [GSE241235](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE241235): RNA-seq data for 30 PAXGene tube blood samples has been deposited on GEO under the accession number xxxx (pending approval)
